items.sentence: Tom told me Mary wasn't able to speak French.
Tom told me he would go to Boston in October.
Tom said he'd be driving to Boston on Monday.
Tom said that he was good at speaking French.
Tom must've seen Mary when he visited Boston.
Tom will probably be arrested this afternoon.
Tom's company got bought by a larger company.
Tom will probably be the last one to go home.
Tom proposed to Mary in a Chinese restaurant.
Do you think Tom would be willing to do that?
